title: 2015 BMW M4 - Everything You Need to Know - AFTER/DRIVE
description: The new M4 ditches the "3" in BMW's most iconic car, adds boost, and goes to electric steering. It's a lot for the M3 fan to take in, so Mike Spinelli sat down with BMW's V.P. of Engineering, Albert Biermann, to talk about how they approached the car, why it's so good, and why it's all about steering.
